sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_sow_itsm_common.SOWITSMCommonClientUtilsSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>SOWITSMCommonClientUtilsSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SOWITSMCommonClientUtilsSNC = Class.create();
SOWITSMCommonClientUtilsSNC.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    initialize: function(request, responseXML, gc) {
        global.AbstractAjaxProcessor.prototype.initialize.call(this, request, responseXML, gc);
    },

    TABLES: {
        SYS_USER_GRMEMBER: 'sys_user_grmember',
        SYS_USER: 'sys_user'
    },

    getMemberGroups: function(userSysID) {
        if (userSysID === undefined)
            userSysID = this.getParameter('userSysID');
        return JSON.stringify(this._getMemberGroups(userSysID));
    },

    _getMemberGroups: function(userSysID) {
        if (!userSysID)
            return;
        var memberGroups = [];
        var pm = new GlidePluginManager();
        var grMembers = new GlideRecord(this.TABLES.SYS_USER_GRMEMBER);
        grMembers.addQuery('group.active', 'true');
        grMembers.addQuery('user', userSysID);
        grMembers.query();
        while (grMembers.next()) {
            memberGroups.push({
                sys_id: grMembers.group + '',
                displayName: grMembers.group.getDisplayValue()
            });
        }
        if (pm.isActive("com.snc.wfo") && memberGroups.length > 1) {
            var gr = new GlideRecord(this.TABLES.SYS_USER);
            if (gr.get(userSysID) && gr.primary_group) {
                memberGroups = [];
                memberGroups.push({
                    sys_id: gr.primary_group + '',
                    displayName: gr.primary_group.getDisplayValue()
                });
            }
        }
        return memberGroups;
    },

    type: 'SOWITSMCommonClientUtilsSNC'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-11-01 16:14:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>83d911b17763301027aae297cd5a993c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SOWITSMCommonClientUtilsSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Operations Workspace ITSM Common" source="sn_sow_itsm_common">0eef12637311301045216238edf6a75e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Service Operations Workspace ITSM Common">0eef12637311301045216238edf6a75e</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_83d911b17763301027aae297cd5a993c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-11-25 10:25:24</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
